item.title: iTunes Library Data Analysis using Python
item.description: If you use iTunes to listen to your music, you can export your iTunes library data as an XML file! Open iTunes File > Export Library… Save the file at your desired directory There are many ways to parse an XML file, but in this demo, I will be using xml.etree.ElementTree module to parse it. You can read more about the module here: https://docs.python.org/3/library/xml.etree.elementtree.html If you open the XML file with a text editor, you will see that the data inside the XML file is structured like the screenshot below.
